## Mid-term projections {.tabset}

### Infection incidence {.tabset}

#### By region
```{r reg-medterm-inf}
trim.array <- function(arrIn){
    R.utils::extract(arrIn, indices = list(end.hosp:length(dimnames(infections)$date)), dims = "date", drop = FALSE)
}
if (!exists("projections_file")) projections_file <- "projections.RData"
load(file.path(out.dir, projections_file))
if (!exists("make.plots")) source(file.path(Rfile.loc, "plot_funcs.R"))
make.plots(trim.array(infections), by = "region", project.forwards = TRUE)
```

#### By age
```{r age-medterm-inf}
make.plots(trim.array(infections), by = "age", project.forwards = TRUE)
```
